archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Security Architecture Review Process (SAR1)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Security Architecture Review Process (SAR1) is a self-assessment process consisting of 5 key questions designed to ensure we have covered our security by design basics. SAR1 is a fully automated process designed to be quick and easy, resulting in scores from 0-15 points, depending on the answers given to the questions.
As well as reporting, at the end of this process, scores are provided back to the architect submitting.
